CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Across The Threshold - James Henry Grate of Milwaukee Street carries his pretty bride, the former Gloria Golden across the threshold of their new home. The wedding was performed at Wesley Center AME Zion Church last Sunday afternoon with the Rev. Charles Foggie officiating. The bride is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Jessie Golden. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Bride Gloria Golden Grate and groom James Henry Grate walking out of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, with men, women, and children standing on either side of steps
